title.narrative: Clima, naturaleza y comunidades en Guatemala (CNCG)
Sustaining Job Creation to Mitigate COVID-19 Shocks (Climate, Nature, and Communities in Guatemala - CNCG)

description.narrative: (Guatemala): .USAID's Climate, Nature, and Communities in Guatemala (CNCG) promotes climate change mitigation by improving management of natural resources and biodiversity conservation, building capacity of key institutions, and strengthening policy and legal frameworks. Focused in the Western Highlands, Alta Verapaz and Baja Verapaz and the Maya Biosphere Reserve, CNCG will:.. .Develop and strengthen market-driven, community level conservation,Reduce vulnerability to climate change, andStrengthen non-governmental organizations.. ..CNCG will work with high-risk populations to weather current market and environmental shocks rather than migrating as a coping strategy. Quick impact interventions will conserve biodiversity along with maintaining and increasing forest cover in areas critical for small-scale agriculture and forest managers. Activities include establishment and expansion of existing native tree nurseries; creation and maintenance of short and medium-term jobs, and establishment of rapid partnerships with the private sector to support implementation and access to timber and non-timber markets... ..USAID will create market-driven job opportunities for underserved populations. It will help communities prepare for, mitigate, and address possible second-order economic, civilian-security, stabilization, and governance impacts of COVID-19. Interventions will enhance incomes for Guatemalan vulnerable populations who are now experiencing the economic shocks resulting from COVID-19. It will provide immediate response to reduce vulnerability and strengthen resilience by providing employment via natural-resource oriented small and medium enterprises. .. ..These activities support the Joint Strategic Plan Goal of "Renew America's Competitive Advantage for Sustained Economic Growth and Job Creation" by managing and conserving protected areas that harbor critical ecosystem services that play a key role in economic growth, fostering security, and good governance..

(Guatemala):. El clima, la naturaleza, y las comunidades de USAID en Guatemala (CNCG) promueve la mitigación del cambio de clima mejorando la gestión de recursos naturales y de la protección de la biodiversidad, construyendo la capacidad institucional y técnica de las instituciones dominantes, y fortaleciendo la política y marcos jurídicos. Enfocado en las montañas occidentales, los departamentos de Alta Verapaz y de Baja Verapaz, Maya Biosphere Reserve, y los las Minas Biosphere Reserve, CNCG de Sierra de:. Desarrolle y fortalezca la protección del nivel del mercado, de comunidad, tal como cadenas de valores de la madera y de la no-madera. Emisiones de reducción nacionales y subnacionales anticipadas de estrategias de la tala de árboles y de Forest Degradation Plus (REDD+). Reduzca la vulnerabilidad al cambio de clima. Fortalezca las organizaciones no gubernamentales...
